item.description:
** PLEASE NOTE:  LOCATION AND DIRECTIONS HAVE BEEN SENT TO THOSE WHO RSVPd YES ONLY

AS OF THIS AFTERNOON 9/8/11 ** THANKS!

 

Let's get together and plan for our next 12 weeks of Artist Way chapter work!  If you want, bring a potluck item and we can eat, meet and schedule our meetups.

 

We will again focus on The Artist's Way by Julia Cameron Chapters 1-12.  The BASIC TOOLS will be covered at this first intro meetup.
item.how_to_find_us: Location and directions have been sent by separate email to all YES RSVPs *******
item.name: FRESH START FALL 2011 ARTIST'S WAY ** POTLUCK INTRO
